title: She vanished before Christmas 24 years ago: North Carolina mother of three found alive living a secret new life
summary_full: A North Carolina mother, missing for nearly 24 years, has been found alive. Michele Lyn Hundley Smith, who vanished at 38 before Christmas 2001, was located in February 2026, living a new life. Her reappearance has brought relief mixed with pain and unanswered questions for her family, reopening a puzzling cold case.
